archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0892
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Suspense Specialist, I want the ability to do analysis on any CDRs that have failed to be rated and billed to customer (i.e. 'suspense') , for DX customers so that I can resolve the billing reducuing revenue leakage

properties.value: Is this requirements for online or only for offline, postpaid customers will be processed in online. REP:How the required data should be provided on BSS side ? available for user on system screens? database level ? particular report/export ? (if Yes - what format is required/expected ?)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
